scenes.description: Tsunomaki Watame performs the ending of 'Wonderland and the Sheep's Song' and addresses the audience.
Transition scene showing the stage and the audience with yellow light sticks.
Tsunomaki Watame performs a cover of 'dawn' by LiSA, featuring dynamic stage effects like fire and lyric typography on the background screen.

subtitles.original: ラララ...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: 最後まで盛り上がって行きましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's keep the energy up until the end!

subtitles.original: 本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original:
dawn
作詞: LiSA 作曲: 草野華余子 / 堀江晶太
subtitles.english:
dawn
Lyrics: LiSA Composition: Kayoko Kusano / Shota Horie

subtitles.original: 無数に広がる　夢と願いが
subtitles.english: Countless dreams and wishes spread out,

subtitles.original: 夜に飲み込まれ　姿を消してく
subtitles.english: Are swallowed by the night and disappear.

subtitles.original: 試されている　この答えと
subtitles.english: The answer and my resolve

subtitles.original: 僕の覚悟は本物か
subtitles.english: Are being tested to see if they're real.

subtitles.original: 喜びを吸い込んで　不安を吐き出して
subtitles.english: Breathe in the joy, breathe out the anxiety,

subtitles.original: 生かされてる意味を　ずっと探してんだよ
subtitles.english: I've been searching for the meaning of being alive.

subtitles.original: たとえ独り言に　なったとしても
subtitles.english: Even if it just becomes a monologue,

subtitles.original: これが僕の　確かな光と祈り
subtitles.english: This is my certain light and prayer.

subtitles.original: 誠実に生きることで
subtitles.english: By living honestly,

subtitles.original: 強くなれると信じて
subtitles.english: Believing I can become stronger.

subtitles.original: 見逃すな day by day
subtitles.english: Don't miss it, day by day.

subtitles.original: 彷徨い　彷徨い　幾つもの日々を
subtitles.english: Wandering, wandering, I've overtaken

subtitles.original: 追い越したんだ
subtitles.english: So many days.

subtitles.original: 生き残ったこの世界で
subtitles.english: In this world where I survived,

subtitles.original: 新しい　眩しい　幕開けを
subtitles.english: To a new, dazzling beginning,

subtitles.original: 迎えに行こうか
subtitles.english: Shall we go to meet it?

subtitles.original: 愛すべきはずの　大事なものが
subtitles.english: The precious things that should be loved

subtitles.original: 僕ららしさを　また一つ崩してく
subtitles.english: Break down our uniqueness once again.

subtitles.original: 守ると決めた　この正義が
subtitles.english: This justice I've decided to protect,

subtitles.original: 時を誰かを　傷つけてしまおうとも
subtitles.english: Even if it ends up hurting someone or time.

subtitles.original: 涙を飲み干して　幸せ噛み締めて
subtitles.english: Drink up your tears, savor your happiness,

subtitles.original: この存在の意味を　ほら
subtitles.english: The meaning of this existence, look,

subtitles.original: 味わいながら
subtitles.english: As I savor it.

subtitles.original: 例えば全てが　ゼロになっても
subtitles.english: Even if everything becomes zero,

subtitles.original: ありのままと　本音に戻るだけ
subtitles.english: I'll just return to my true self and feelings.

subtitles.original: 重ねた step by step
subtitles.english: Accumulated step by step.

subtitles.original: すれ違い　間違い　傷付いてもまた
subtitles.english: Passing by, mistakes, even if hurt,

subtitles.original: ここに立ってんだ
subtitles.english: I'm standing here again.

subtitles.original: 悩み抜いたその先で
subtitles.english: Beyond all the worries,

subtitles.original: 悔やまない　逃げない　ただ一つの
subtitles.english: The one and only way for me,

subtitles.original: 僕のやり方
subtitles.english: Without regrets or running away.

subtitles.original: 見逃すな day by day
subtitles.english: Don't miss it, day by day.

subtitles.original: 彷徨い　彷徨い　幾つもの日々を
subtitles.english: Wandering, wandering, I've overtaken

subtitles.original: 追い越したんだ
subtitles.english: So many days.

subtitles.original: 生き残ったこの世界で
subtitles.english: In this world where I survived,

subtitles.original: 新しい　眩しい　幕開けを
subtitles.english: To a new, dazzling beginning,

subtitles.original: 迎えに行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go to meet it.

subtitles.original: 巡り巡る view で
subtitles.english: In the cycling view,

subtitles.original: 泣いても　逃げても　幸せをいつも
subtitles.english: Even if I cry or run away, I always

subtitles.original: 願っていたい
subtitles.english: Want to keep wishing for happiness.

subtitles.original: いつか終わるその日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day it eventually ends,

subtitles.original: 新しい　眩しい　幕開けを
subtitles.english: To a new, dazzling beginning,

subtitles.original: 迎えに行こうか
subtitles.english: Shall we go to meet it?
